thread.title: Flu responsible for 22 more child deaths

title: Flu responsible for 22 more child deaths

organizations.name: u.s. centers for disease control and prevention

text:
Flu responsible for 22 more child deaths Saturday, February 17, 2018 - 01:02 
The flu claimed 22 children's lives this week, according to the latest report from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, bringing the total number of child deaths to 84 this season.   
The flu claimed 22 children's lives this week, according to the latest report from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, bringing the total number of child deaths to 84 this season.  //reut.rs/2EQ9YjQ
